base_prompt: Write a continuation of this text using {variation}: 'It was a dark and stormy night.'
variations: imitate the style of J.K. Rowling

outputs.prompt: Write a continuation of this text using a neutral tone: 'It was a dark and stormy night.'
outputs.generated_text:
The heavy rain was falling relentlessly, beating down on the rooftops with a steady rhythm. The wind was howling through the narrow streets, whipping up fallen leaves into a swirling frenzy. Lightning flashed across the sky, illuminating the inky darkness momentarily. The loud clap of thunder that followed seemed to shake the very foundations of the earth. 

In the heart of the city, life continued as usual. People huddled under umbrellas, rushing to get home and avoid the worst of the storm.

outputs.prompt: Write a continuation of this text using a romantic style: 'It was a dark and stormy night.'
outputs.generated_text:
The heavens were engaged in a relentless duel, unleashing torrents of rain that pounded against the cobblestone streets. A veil of obscurity had descended upon the quiet town, broken only by the fleeting bursts of heat lightning that illuminated the silhouette of a grand mansion perched atop the hill. The edifice stood resolute against the tempest, its stone façade drenched with rainwater, reflecting the tumultuous sky above.
